=====================
Pronouns: ti/ta/tu
=====================

ti klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (ti)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))

ta klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (ta)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))

tu klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (tu)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))
